head.title: Set {{FileFormatUp}} page orientation in {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: {{ProdFullName}} lets you switch {{FileFormatUp}} pages between portrait and landscape. Manage PDFs, Word docs, Excel files, PowerPoint slides, Visio charts, images, archives, and more with precision.

header.title: Page orientation for {{FileFormatUp}} files
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} adds smart features to {{EnvNameShort}} apps. Developers can improve their tools by handling popular formats and setting {{FileFormatUp}} page orientations.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: {{ProdShortName}} Overview
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) tackles document management for 50+ formats like PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, images, and archives. Merge, split, extract, reorder, swap, delete, or adjust page layouts with ease.

more_features.title: Dynamic document control
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides a solid toolkit for managing content across 50+ file formats with quick and dependable results.

feature_1.title: Join different file formats
feature_1.content: Link up PDFs, Word files, presentations, spreadsheets, Visio diagrams, images, and archives. Adjust settings for a perfect fit.

feature_2.title: Rearrange document pages
feature_2.content: Move, swap, or drop pages to shape your document flow.

feature_3.title: Tune page orientation
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to an angle or toggle between portrait and landscape views.

feature_4.title: Save pages as new files
feature_4.content: Select pages and export them as a standalone file to any spot.

formats.title: Adjust orientation for multiple formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file types, letting you refine documents with a broad set of options.

operations.title: Main features
operations.description: Discover tools to power up your solutions.

content.title: Use [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) to modify {{FileFormatUp}} page layouts. This and other tools bring strong document handling to {{EnvName}} apps.
content.step_2: Choose the page to work on.

code_1.title: Flip the last page in a {{FileFormatUp}} file
code_1.content: Find out how to tally pages in a {{FileFormatUp}} document and adjust the last pageâ€™s layout.
code_1.comment_1: Open the file in the constructor
code_1.comment_3: Choose the page and set portrait or landscape
code_1.comment_5: Save the file to a new path
